page.title: 01Marston Village
page.content: Marston is a small village and it is very quiet and not many cars come by.Marston is very tidy and peacful.Marston is handy because there are about 5 shopping places you can go to like Rocester is 2 miles,Derby 12 miles,Ashbourne 7 miles,Uttoxeter 5 miles and Burton on Trent is quite local.Marston has a pub at the corner of the village and next to it Mr Cox is renoating a cottage and it is for sale.There are people who have lived here a long time and people who have only been here a short time.There are some new houses being built and some very old ones.There is a church it is very old about 10th or 11th century. The countryside has small,hilly fields with hedges and trees.The lanes are narrow and quiet.
